§6§lThe Price of Matching Selfish Vertices§r

§8§oYuval Emek
Tobias Langner
Roger Wattenhofer§r

§72012§r

Comments: \u00a77\u00a7oWe changed the perspective of our paper and now look at the minimum-cost perfect matching problem through the price of anarchy (PoA) and price of stability (PoS) lens. Our previous results can be seen as analyzing the
PoS of minimum-cost perfect matching and we now added an analysis of the PoA of this problem\u00a7r
